name: CataGolf (Trufufufufufu Games)
description:
Hello !

I'd like to share with you the first ten levels of my new game, CataGolf !

CataGolf is a platformer/sport game where a giant bipedal cat has to, well, put the ball in the hole with his trustworthy club !

Easy, isn't it ? Well, the world of CataGolf is not as peaceful as a regular golf course... exploding pinguins, mines, locked doors and many other hazards are set between you and the sacred flag ! The first lvels are  easy, but the game becomes pretty challenging as long as you play !

100 levels are planned, each having a par and bogey score to unlock more levels and cat/club skins. The full game will be available depending on the success of this preview ;)

I hope you will enjoy this little sneak peek, and please let me know what you think about this game in the comment section below ! Every comment is like a giant step for me :D

Aces !
